children.name: am
children.sourceText: Behold, I am guilty, and these men are spotless before God.

children.name: Amulek
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: answer
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: ask
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: authority
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: being
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: believe
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: command
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: dead
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: deny
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: does
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: existence
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: father
children.sourceText: Is the Son of God the very Eternal Father?

children.name: give
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: God
children.sourceText: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: had
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: hast
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: hath
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: is
children.sourceText: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: judged
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: knowest
children.sourceText: How knowest thou these things?

children.name: living
children.sourceText: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: mean
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: men
children.sourceText: Behold, I am guilty, and these men are spotless before God.

children.name: onties
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: people
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: put
children.sourceText: Will ye answer the questions which I shall put unto you?

children.name: questions
children.sourceText: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: remember
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: resurrection
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: rise
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: said
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: saith
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: sayest
children.sourceText: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: see
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people, as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: silver
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: sins
children.sourceText: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: son
children.sourceText: Is it the Son of God?

children.name: spoken
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: stand
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: taught
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: things
children.sourceText: How knowest thou these things?

children.name: wilt
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: words
children.sourceText: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: works
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: behold
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: come
children.sourceText: Who is he that shall come?
